candidates.why: Exact target/oracle command doc; defines phases 0-3 and artifacts (IMPL_PLAN.md, TODO_LIST.md, .task/*.json).
Same planning-artifact generation family; similar Phase 0 configuration + module detection + (optionally) parallel planning.
Same output shape (IMPL_PLAN.md + task JSONs + TODO_LIST.md) but specialized for tests; useful for validation/quality-gate patterns.
Upstream dependency producer of .process/context-package.json; documents session folder conventions and Task delegation patterns.
End-to-end workflow that calls task generation in Phase 4; clarifies artifact expectations and phase boundaries.
